message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_LARGE
message.locale: The Registration Date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_ENDDATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the registration date.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_PHONENUMBER_CONTACTNAME
message.locale: A contact name must be specified when a phone number is specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_CONTACTTYPE_CONTACTNAME
message.locale: A contact name must be specified when a contact type is specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_CONTACTNAME_CONTACTTYPE
message.locale: A contact type must be specified for contact name.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_FV_REGISTERED_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The registered name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_REG_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Product provider registration date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_PHONETYPE_PHONENUMBER
message.locale: A phone number type must be specified when phone number is specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONETYPE
message.locale: A phone number must be specified when phone number type is specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone details must contain both a phone number and a phone type.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROV_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONEAREACODE_EMPTY
message.locale: A phone area code must be entered.
